items.title: Hands-on fund managers drive ETF growth
items.description: BlackRock's Jay Jacobs predicts active exchange-traded fund management will provide significant value in 2026 amid stock market volatility.

items.title: Ford cuts electric F-150 Lightning production, takes $19.5B charge in strategic shift
items.description: Ford cuts F-150 Lightning production as CEO Jim Farley shifts strategic focus to hybrids and affordable EVs, taking massive $19.5 billion charge.
